project.ggDebit: I explicitly authorize Union Bank of the Philippines to enroll me in the GetGo Rewards Program and pursuant thereto, to share my relevant information with Cebu Air, Inc..
project.citySavings: I consent to the disclosure by UnionBank of my Personal Data to CitySavings Bank for its product and service offerings (i.e. promotional loan and pensionado loan).
